name: aromer-strategy
description: AROMER cross-venue quant strategy. Subscribes to all venue NATS feeds, aggregates cross-venue signals using event-resolver mappings, runs paper trading with realistic fees/slippage/latency, and tracks P&L/Sharpe/drawdown with a configurable kill switch.

jobs.name: paperTrade
jobs.description: Paper trading cycle: subscribe to all venue NATS feeds, aggregate cross-venue signals, simulate trades.

jobs.name: reportMetrics
jobs.description: Snapshot current P&L, Sharpe, win rate, max drawdown, per-venue edge to NATS + Postgres.

jobs.name: backtest
jobs.description: Run backtest using historical trades from all venues. Requires start_time and end_time in job data.

settings.description: Minimum event-resolver mapping confidence to act on a signal
JSON: venue name -> signal weight multiplier
Default notional per trade in USD
Kill switch: max notional per position in USD
Kill switch: max open positions at any time
Kill switch: max loss per day before halting
Minimum price move % on leader venue to generate a signal
Annual risk-free rate for Sharpe ratio
